message: Let's be fair, Bob. I propose a 52.5% / 47.5% split in my favor.  Consider accepting, each round the total amount shrinks!
I think we can do better than your initial offer, Alice. Considering the decreasing value, let's split it 55% for me and 45% for you. It's more than fair!
Bob, this back and forth isn't helping either of us. Let's stop wasting time and split it evenly 50/50. It's the fairest deal we'll get.
